topics.title: Salvotnt AnimeBlog Update !!
topics.body:
Updated now!!
Please visit my blog about japanimation and more ....
   




  http://127.0.0.1:43110/1LHt9Ry3aoH7tBmbbKyquu7wEK2EE7yzcs

1@105.body:
thanks , nofish.

what about changing layout , existing any editor ?

2@105.body: thanks , I'm italian . Animation is my passion : )

3@105.body:
Blushing.... , thanks nofish

p.s.

Have you planned to adding bbcode in zerotalk forum ? I like to have interactive sites , blogs is not what I love: Zero interactivity with user...
Are welcome any plugin like disqus for blogs :useful I think.
Thanks a lot , don't have wallet , it's all for free , only passion. Another update , for tokyo ghoul series...
Another update for an old shin cutey honey series re-release...

3@2.body: Addying bitmessage message system will be GREAT !! I think.....

Addying bittorrent client capacity will be GREAT !! I think.....
https://github.com/JosephSalisbury/python-bittorrent
